title: condoras
author: condoras
content: As the title says, I have Bitcoin and I want 100 EUR PayPal at preev rate 1:1. Trusted members only or members that I have dealt with in the past and I prefer that you go first. Anyone who has an interest to fill this, post here.Thank you in advance.

comments.author: -doubleU-
comments.body: Nice to see your offer here. I have a few euros in my paypal and as we had some smooth trades in the past I am able to do so again.Feel free to send me your trade information as a personal message if you would like to make this trade with me.

comments.author: condoras
comments.body: Quote from: -doubleU- on October 31, 2022, 01:27:50 PMNice to see your offer here. I have a few euros in my paypal and as we had some smooth trades in the past I am able to do so again.Feel free to send me your trade information as a personal message if you would like to make this trade with me.Happy to see that you are interested to fill it. PP info sent, don't forget to send me your BTC address.

comments.author: -doubleU-
comments.body: Quote from: condoras on October 31, 2022, 06:56:30 PMPP info sent, don't forget to send me your BTC address.Then let's do the trade, i received your message with your Paypal address and will pay the amount in the next minutes.I send you my Bitcoin adress (the same as from our last trade) as PN. When i received the coins i will confirm a succesful trade here.

comments.author: condoras
comments.body: Quote from: -doubleU- on November 01, 2022, 05:49:56 AMQuote from: condoras on October 31, 2022, 06:56:30 PMPP info sent, don't forget to send me your BTC address.Then let's do the trade, i received your message with your Paypal address and will pay the amount in the next minutes.I send you my Bitcoin adress (the same as from our last trade) as PN. When i received the coins i will confirm a succesful trade here.Great. I get the PayPal funds and BTC sent. Verify here when you get them, so I can lock the thread.

comments.author: -doubleU-
comments.body: I can just confirming that I received the coins a few hours ago. Thank you for this another quick and smooth trade.Â  You can now lock this thread, everything is fine.We can trade gladly again if you need a few euros again.
